description.value:
You use the material component of this spell as a planar anchor, harmonizing yourself and the area surrounding the anchor with a plane of your choice. The anchor must be placed anywhere within range, and the spell fails if you don’t remain within range of the anchor during the entire casting time.

When you finish casting the spell, the anchor melds into the environment, creating a localized weakness in the planar boundary that precipitates the creation of a 5-foot-radius manifest zone tied to your chosen plane. The fledgling zone expands in radius at the rate of 5 feet per day, to a maximum of 150 feet. Additional castings of this spell don’t stack, but multiple adjacent or overlapping areas can be created.

The new manifest zone has one planar trait of your choice from the plane to which it is tied.

materials.value: a Siberys dragonshard or essence from the plane to be anchored worth at least 7,500 gp, which the spell consumes
